text: Then Johanan the son of Kareah and all the captains of the forces who were with him took all the remnant of the people whom he had recovered from Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, from Mizpah, after he had killed Gedaliah the son of Ahikamâ€”the men of war, with the women, the children, and the eunuchs, whom he had brought back from Gibeon.
